img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy forest environment. A character in red armor is engaged in combat with a large, muscular enemy wielding a weapon. The character is performing an upward sword strike, causing sparks to fly from the enemy's weapon. Various game interface elements are visible, including health bars and ability icons in the bottom corners of the screen. The text "Non Able" is displayed above the health bar, possibly indicating a status effect or action limitation. The snowy landscape is detailed with trees and patches of grass.
